about_the_game:
A collection of 16 songs by musicians Kyle Ward and John Mendenhall of Oscillator X, with over 75 song charts. Featuring positive & energetic dance music – a 90’s feel with modern appeal!

List of Songs

  • Coconut - Kitty Cat
  • Coconut - Ladybug
  • E-Racer - Elder God Shrine
  • KaW - Frozen Fire
  • KaW - Goin' Home
  • KaW feat Sam-I-Am - Move It Groove It
  • Oscillator X - Believe in You (Sammy LaForge Radio Edit)
  • Oscillator X - London Bridge
  • Oscillator X - Shine (Breakz Mix)
  • Oscillator X - Sugar Sweet
  • Oscillator X - Together With You
  • When Machines Dream - Cosmic Unconsciousness
  • When Machines Dream - End of Line
  • When Machines Dream - Epilogue
  • When Machines Dream - Prognosis
  • When Machines Dream - Rock Robotic

name: Pulsen: Oscillator X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows Vista or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
